text:
TV4 is a Swedish free-to-air television network owned by TV4 AB. It is owned by the Bonnier Broadcasting Group.
It started broadcasting by satellite in 1990 and, since 1992, on television. In 1994, TV4 became the largest channel and remained so for a number of years.
From 2004 to 2019, the TV4 Group was a fully active member of the European Broadcasting Union.
